problems.title: Select Elementary Improper Integrals I
problems.preview: A curated set of challenging improper integrals that appear elementary but require subtle techniques. Includes integrals with limits to infinity, singularities, or symmetry-based tricks.
problems.author: Kris Yotam

problems.title: Cleoâ€™s Integral
problems.preview: Known as the 'monster integral' from Math StackExchange, this infamous definite integral shocked the math community when Cleo posted its elegant answer with no steps: $4\pi\,\arccot\sqrt\varphi$.
problems.author: Vladimir Reshetnikov

problems.title: Lasagna (C++)
problems.preview: Learn the basics of C++ by cooking lasagna
problems.author: Kris Yotam
